question: What is the full form of "TOC" in the context of Microsoft Word?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Table of Contents

question: What is the primary purpose of Smart Lookup in Microsoft Word?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Quick access to exploring word.

question: Identify the feature in Google Lens that translates text from images.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Optical Character Recognition (OCR)

question: Google Lens assists in solving math problems by using ________________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is AI-powered Equation Scanner

question: You are comparing two sites to buy a pen drive: one shows real customer reviews, and one has no details. Which one would you trust more and why?
options: First – it has more photos only
explanation: The Correct Answer is First – it shares honest feedback

question: Your school’s result portal says “Unsecure – Not HTTPS”. Should you log in to check your marks?
options: No – it may not be safe
Yes – if it has a logo
explanation: The Correct Answer is No – it may not be safe

question: You are told to create a password. Which is safest?
explanation: The Correct Answer is School@2025!

question: Your teacher asked you to make a blog about your school’s science fair. What tool do you need?
options: A blogging platform or website builder
explanation: The Correct Answer is A blogging platform or website builder

question: You want to create a web page to show your art project online. Which language will help you start?
explanation: The Correct Answer is HTML

question: Imagine you are launching a website for “Young Coders Club.” Which domain will suit best?
explanation: The Correct Answer is www.youngcodersclub.org

question: Your school is celebrating Environment Day and wants to create an email campaign. What 3 elements should you include?
options: Font colour, big title, and music
Greeting, images, and call to action (like “Join Us”)
explanation: The Correct Answer is Greeting, images, and call to action (like “Join Us”)

question: You are helping a friend create a secure e-commerce site. What should you add on the site to show it is safe?
options: HTTPS in the URL and a lock symbol
explanation: The Correct Answer is HTTPS in the URL and a lock symbol

question: Imagine you are writing a report about “Safe Internet Use”. Which 3 points would you include?
options: Share passwords, open all links, try random sites
Use strong passwords, avoid unknown links, check for HTTPS
Visit any free site, keep passwords simple, allow pop-ups
explanation: The Correct Answer is Use strong passwords, avoid unknown links, check for HTTPS

question: Your school wants to promote its new computer lab online. What’s a creative way to do it?
options: Post details in a WhatsApp group
Upload a poster to a secure webpage with photos and form
Print and give it to neighbours
explanation: The Correct Answer is Upload a poster to a secure webpage with photos and form

question: You are going to meet your uncle at his house which is 10 kms away. Since you are going there for the first time, your uncle wants to track you while moving so that you do not go in wrong direction. Which feature of WhatsApp can you use to help your uncle track you?
explanation: The Correct Answer is WhatsApp Live Location Sharing

question: Which of the following, time duration options are availale while sharing Live Location in WhatsApp?
explanation: The Correct Answer is 15 mins, 1 Hour and 8 hours

question: How can you copy the URL of a YouTube video at the current time for sharing?
options: Right-click on the video, select 'Copy Video URL,' and paste it
Manually type the current time in the URL after copying
Right-click on the video, select 'Copy video URL at current time,' and paste it
Share the video and type the current time in the message
explanation: The Correct Answer is Right-click on the video, select 'Copy video URL at current time,' and paste it

question: How can you initiate Conversation Mode in Google Translate on a smartphone?
options: Tap the microphone icon in the app
Send a voice command via email
explanation: The Correct Answer is Tap the microphone icon in the app

question: What is the primary method to access Google Translate on a computer or laptop?
options: Access it through a web browser
Request a physical copy from Google
explanation: The Correct Answer is Access it through a web browser

question: Which of the following is not an e-commerce company?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Google

question: Flipkart in an e-commerce company founded in which country?
explanation: The Correct Answer is India

question: In PhotoScan app, what does the highlighted symbol denote?
options: Photo is captured and ready for scan
Video is captured and ready for scan
explanation: The Correct Answer is Photo is captured and ready for scan

question: To turn off your camera quickly in a Google Meet meeting, which keyboard shortcut should you use?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Ctrl + E

question: Identify the feature that provides a list of email ids for the participating members in Google Meet.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Google Contacts

question: Where can you schedule a new meeting on Google Meet?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Google Calendar

question: How can the Translated Captions feature be helpful in education settings?
options: By providing a grid view of participants during a video call
By cancelling background noise during a video call
By allowing educators to connect and interact with students, parents, with diverse backgrounds
By translating written text into different languages
explanation: The Correct Answer is By allowing educators to connect and interact with students, parents, with diverse backgrounds

question: What is the Translated Captions feature in Google Meet?
options: A feature that allows users to blur their background during video calls
A feature that translates spoken English into captions in real-time during a video conference
A feature that cancels background noise during a video call
A feature that provides a grid view of participants during a video call
explanation: The Correct Answer is A feature that translates spoken English into captions in real-time during a video conference

question: Choose the platform that helps you to hold meetings with 500 people at a time.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Google Meet

question: Which of the following is not true in case of Truecaller?
options: It is an online address book.
You can block numbers from whom you don't want to get calls.
You can know who is calling you, even you don't have the contact saved.
explanation: The Correct Answer is It is an online address book.

question: What is Truecaller?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Online phonebook

question: WhatsApp Meta AI helps business users mainly by providing ____.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Automatic customer interactions

question: This interaction best illustrates which WhatsApp Meta AI capability?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Real-time information retrieval

question: Which technology enables Notion to respond quickly to your commands?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Natural Language Processing

question: What is the main function of Todoist?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Task management

question: Todoist uses GPT-3 AI primarily to __________________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is understand written commands

question: What can you track using Habitica?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Daily habits

question: Habitica rewards users primarily by ____________.
explanation: The Correct Answer is Virtual points and achievements

question: How does Suno create music?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Using Generative AI

question: What does this image most accurately depict?
explanation: The Correct Answer is AI-based music creation

question: Rahul typed "https://www.mkcl.org" in his browser and pressed Enter to open the website. What is this full line called?
options: Website Name – because it shows where he wants to go
IP Address – because it connects to the Internet
URL – because it is the full web address
HTML – because websites are written in it
explanation: The Correct Answer is URL – because it is the full web address

question: A friend showed Anjali two things: a browser and an ISP. She got confused. What does an ISP help with?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Connecting to the Internet

question: Ramesh opened a news website, but some images didn’t load. His teacher said a tool might be missing. What is the tool called?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Plug-in – to run extra media

question: Sneha clicked on a button that said “Buy Now” on a shopping website. It opened a page asking for her name and address. What kind of page is this?
options: Blog – because it has written content
E-form – because it asks for user details
Home Page – because it’s the start
explanation: The Correct Answer is E-form – because it asks for user details

question: Your school portal allows students to download worksheets. What kind of tool or service helps this process?
explanation: The Correct Answer is FTP – because it moves files

question: A student says, “Internet and Web are just two names for the same thing.” Which sentence will help him understand correctly?
options: Internet and Web are always used together
Web is the service that works on the Internet
Web is a network of mobile phones
Internet is only for sending messages
explanation: The Correct Answer is Web is the service that works on the Internet

question: Your teacher showed a web page with pictures and text. He said it was written using a special language. What is this language called?
options: PDF – because the file had images
MS Word – because it has text
explanation: The Correct Answer is HTML – because it builds websites

question: Priya clicked on the word “Gallery” on her school website, and it opened a new page with photos. What is such clickable text called?
options: Bookmark – because it saves her page
explanation: The Correct Answer is Hyperlink – because it connects pages

question: Akash visited a shopping website and selected a toy. Next day, when he opened the same site, the toy was still in his cart. What helped the site remember him?
options: Web Page – because it keeps the toy
Cookie – because it stores user info
explanation: The Correct Answer is Cookie – because it stores user info

question: A student saw “.com” and “.edu” at the end of website addresses. What do these endings show?
explanation: The Correct Answer is The purpose of the site

question: In the "Mailing" tab, which option is used to insert merge fields into a document during the mail merge process?
explanation: The Correct Answer is Insert Merge Field
